content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (-5.5, 25.0)
Consists of:
- Offshore Pump at position (-9.5, 24.5)
- Boiler at position (-5.5, 25.0)
- Steam Engine at position (-0.5, 25.5)
- PipeGroup connecting Offshore Pump to Boiler and Steam Engine:
  - Pipes at positions: (-9.5, 23.5), (-8.5, 23.5), ..., (-7.5, 25.5)

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (15.0, 0.0)
Consists of:
- Stone Furnace at position (15.0, 0.0)
- Inserters at positions (16.5, 0.5) and (17.5, 0.5) connected to power network
- Wooden Chests at positions (5.5, 0.5) and (18.5, 0.5)
- Electricity Group with poles at positions: (7.5, 10.5), (17.5, -0.5), ..., (1.5, 25.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when Reconnecting Pipes
- Ensure you have the necessary pipes in your inventory before attempting to reconnect.
- Verify that the connection points are correctly aligned and within reach.

### Errors with Inserter Alignment and Power
- Make sure inserters are properly aligned to pick up and drop items correctly.
- Connect inserters to a power source to ensure they are operational.

### Errors with Fuel Management
- Keep track of fuel levels in boilers and furnaces to avoid running out of fuel.
- Regularly check and refill fuel to maintain continuous operation.

### Errors with Inventory Management
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into entities.
- Manage inventory space efficiently to prevent running out of necessary materials.
